languages.text:
"Считать мгновенья мудро, ведь они
Стремятся в пустоту, влача с собой
Часы твои, секунды, даже дни,
Где жнец их в пыль сотрет худой рукой".

traits.locale_text:
"Считать мгновенья мудро, ведь они
Стремятся в пустоту, влача с собой
Часы твои, секунды, даже дни,
Где жнец их в пыль сотрет худой рукой".

languages.text:
"'Tis wise indeed to count each moment past,
To nothingness they stream like grains of sand,
They steal your hours and days until at last
They turn to dust in reaper's wasted hand."
languages.original_text:
"Считать мгновенья мудро, ведь они
Стремятся в пустоту, влача с собой
Часы твои, секунды, даже дни,
Где жнец их в пыль сотрет худой рукой".

"'Tis wise indeed to count each moment past,
To nothingness they stream like grains of sand,
They steal your hours and days until at last

languages.text:
“计算每分每秒的流逝是明智之见，
因为它们会像砂砾一样渐隐渐现。
它们会偷走你的时光，到了最后，
它们在死神枯瘦的手中化为尘烟。”
languages.original_text:
"'Tis wise indeed to count each moment past,
To nothingness they stream like grains of sand,
They steal your hours and days until at last
They turn to dust in reaper's wasted hand."

traits.locale_text:
“计算每分每秒的流逝是明智之见，
因为它们会像砂砾一样渐隐渐现。
它们会偷走你的时光，到了最后，
它们在死神枯瘦的手中化为尘烟。”

languages.text:
«Sabio es contar cada momento que pasa,
camino a la nada, como granos de arena,
arrebatando tus horas y días hasta que acaban
como polvo ante la muerte, en su mano negra».
languages.original_text:
"'Tis wise indeed to count each moment past,
To nothingness they stream like grains of sand,
They steal your hours and days until at last
They turn to dust in reaper's wasted hand."

traits.locale_text:
«Sabio es contar cada momento que pasa,
camino a la nada, como granos de arena,
arrebatando tus horas y días hasta que acaban
como polvo ante la muerte, en su mano negra».

languages.text:
「過ぎ去った一瞬を数えるのは実に賢明
砂粒のように無へと帰すもの
君の時間と日々を奪い
最後は死神の朽ちた手の中で塵と化す」
languages.original_text:
"'Tis wise indeed to count each moment past,
To nothingness they stream like grains of sand,
They steal your hours and days until at last
They turn to dust in reaper's wasted hand."

traits.locale_text:
「過ぎ去った一瞬を数えるのは実に賢明
砂粒のように無へと帰すもの
君の時間と日々を奪い
最後は死神の朽ちた手の中で塵と化す」

languages.text:
"Merkt Euch Eures Lebens Augenblicke,
verrinnen zu nichts wie Körner aus Sand.
Stunden, Tage, des Lebens Geschicke
werden zu Staub in des Sensenmanns Hand."
languages.original_text:
"'Tis wise indeed to count each moment past,
To nothingness they stream like grains of sand,
They steal your hours and days until at last
They turn to dust in reaper's wasted hand."

traits.locale_text:
"Merkt Euch Eures Lebens Augenblicke,
verrinnen zu nichts wie Körner aus Sand.
Stunden, Tage, des Lebens Geschicke
werden zu Staub in des Sensenmanns Hand."

languages.text:
« Il est en effet sage de compter chacun de vos instants
Qui s'égrainent tel le sable pour tomber dans le néant.
Ils volent vos heures, jusqu'à ce qu'en dernier ressort,
Ils se transforment en poussière entre les mains de la Mort. »
languages.original_text:
"'Tis wise indeed to count each moment past,
To nothingness they stream like grains of sand,
They steal your hours and days until at last
They turn to dust in reaper's wasted hand."

traits.locale_text:

Ils volent vos heures, jusqu'à ce qu'en dernier ressort,
Ils se transforment en poussière entre les mains de la Mort. »

languages.text:
"Bilge olan her bir dakikanın hesabını yapar,
Hiçliğe kıyasla zaman, kum taneleri gibi akar.
O taneler ki saatlerini ve günlerini çalar bıkana dek,
Ta ki ölümün perişan ellerinde toza dönüşene dek."
languages.original_text:
"'Tis wise indeed to count each moment past,
To nothingness they stream like grains of sand,
They steal your hours and days until at last
They turn to dust in reaper's wasted hand."
